alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...strong thunderstormS will impact portions of southeastern St. Lucie and Martin Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jensen Beach, moving north at 5 mph. Another strong storm was located over Indiantown. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Walton, Fort Pierce, Stuart and Indiantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie
